news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Heura Foods, a Spanish plant-based meat brand, has expanded its market presence by launching products at Esselunga, a leading supermarket chain in Northern Italy. Additionally, Heura Foods contributed to the plant-based menu at Taylor Swift's 'Eras Tour' concerts in Madrid, showcasing its commitment to increasing the accessibility of sustainable and nutritious plant-based meat options.

overview_description.description: Heura Foods is a plant-based startup that produces sustainable and nutritious plant-based meat products. It was founded by food activists Marc Coloma and Bernat Añaños in 2017. Its mission is to create solutions that will leave the current food system obsolete and accelerate the transition to a world where animals are out of the equation. Their Mediterranean culinary heritage is reflected in their products: clean labels, high nutritional values, and taste.

properties.growth_insight_description: Heura Foods posted double-digit growth in 2023. The company raised €40 million in a Series B funding round to eliminate artificial additives from its plant-based meat products. Heura Foods also launched its products at the leading Northern Italian retailer Esselunga and expanded its presence in the UK and Netherlands.

about_short_description.short_description: Heura Foods is a plant-based startup that produces sustainable and nutritious plant-based meat products.

product.name: Plant-based Chicken
product.description: Offers a variety of chicken alternatives including nuggets, fillets, and pieces in original and Mediterranean flavors.

product.name: Plant-based Beef
product.description: Includes products like burgers, ground mince, and meatballs designed to mimic the taste and texture of beef.

product.name: Plant-Based Pork
product.description: Features alternatives to pork products such as sausages and chorizo.

product.name: Plant-based Fish
product.description: Provides fish substitutes including fish fingers and fillets.

product.name: Soy Protein
product.description: A key ingredient in Heura products, used for its high protein content and versatility.

product.name: Pea Protein
product.description: Utilized in Heura products for its nutritional benefits and as a source of plant-based protein.
